text: , known by his pen name , was a Japanese manga artist. He was best known for Kimagure Orange Road. His career started in 1982. Some of his works were on Weekly Sh≈çnen Jump. He was born in Takaoka, Toyama. In November 2019, Terashima revealed that he had been diagnosed with spinal stenosis. Matsumoto died at 61 on October 6, 2020. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Japanese manga artists
